items.title: Why Amgen (AMGN) Could Be a Hidden Gem Among Dividend Pharma Stocks in 2025
items.description: Amgen Inc. (NASDAQ:AMGN) is included among the 14 Best Pharma Dividend Stocks to Buy in 2025. In 2023, the company finalized its $28 billion acquisition of Horizon Therapeutics, a smaller biotech firm. This move helped broaden Amgen’s product portfolio and reduced its reliance on older drugs like Enbrel, which are expected to weigh on future […]
